questions.question: In what Project Nova cohort are you in?
Why were only eight interns selected for Project Nova?
choices: They came from the same university
They were curious and showed potential
They knew how to use Kubernetes already
questions.correct: They were curious and showed potential

questions.question: What is the recommended way to pronounce `kubectl`?
What is the purpose of the training modules at Zentari Labs?
choices: To test how fast you can code
To prepare you for the real cases
questions.correct: To prepare you for the real cases
